# Stand (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Teleportation Spells|teleportation]])

**Level:** [[1st Level Duskblade Spells|Duskblade 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One willing prone creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 125

*With a swift upward gesture of your arms and a single clarion command (“Stand!”), you enable the prone creature to safely rise to its feet.*

The subject creature immediately stands, without provoking attacks of opportunity.
